metadata.feature_description: View and manage activity stream on user profiles

steps.action: Navigate to own profile activity stream at /Activity-Feed/userId/1
steps.expected: Own profile activity stream should be displayed with posts and activity history
steps.actual: Own profile activity stream displayed correctly showing user name (SuperUser Account), stats (Friends, Following, Followers, Points), and activity posts

steps.expected: Activity posts should be displayed with timestamps, Like, Comment, and other action buttons
steps.actual: Multiple activity posts visible including posts, wiki articles, and privileges earned with timestamps and action buttons (Like, Comment, Subscribe/Unsubscribe, Remove, Pin)

steps.action: Navigate to another user's profile activity stream at /Activity-Feed/userId/2 (Content Editor)
steps.expected: Other user's profile and activity stream should be displayed
steps.actual: Content Editor's profile displayed with their stats (Friends: 0, Following: 0, Followers: 0, Points: 7) and Friend/Follow buttons available

steps.action: Verify other user's activity posts are visible
steps.expected: The other user's activity posts should be displayed
steps.actual: Content Editor's activity posts displayed correctly with appropriate action buttons

steps.action: Navigate to own profile and enter text in the post area
steps.expected: Text should be entered in the post editor
steps.actual: Text 'Profile Activity Stream Test Post - Testing own profile wall posting' was entered in the contentEditable post area using JavaScript

steps.expected: Post should be created and appear in the activity stream
steps.actual: Post was successfully created and appeared at the top of the activity stream with timestamp '0 seconds ago'

steps.action: Navigate to Content Editor's profile (userId/2) and enter text in the post area
steps.expected: Text should be entered in the post editor on another user's profile
steps.actual: Text 'New test post on Content Editor profile from SuperUser - testing profile wall functionality' was entered

steps.action: Click Share button to post on other user's wall
steps.expected: Post should be created on the other user's profile wall
steps.actual: Post was successfully created on Content Editor's profile wall and appeared in their activity stream

steps.action: Navigate to profile management page to view privacy settings
steps.expected: Profile privacy settings should be accessible
steps.actual: Profile preferences page displayed with field-level privacy controls for profile information (Biography, Middle Name, Suffix, Unit, Street, City, Region, Country, Postal Code, Telephone, Cell/Mobile, Fax, Website, IM, Photo, Time Zone, Preferred Locale, Preferred Time Zone) with visibility options (Everyone, Members Only, Admin Only)

steps.action: Open the filter dropdown on the profile activity stream
steps.expected: Filter dropdown should display with various activity type options
steps.actual: Filter dropdown displayed with extensive list of activity types: Posts, Links, Photos, Files, Forum Topics, Forum Replies, Blogs, Friends, Group Created, Group Joined, Added to Wiki, Updated Wiki, Added a Document, Updated a Document, Added an Article, Added a Video, Votes, Comment, Questions, Answers, Created Event, Attending Event, Created Project, Updated Project, Added Review, Updated Review, Completed Survey, Created Task, Updated Task, Privilege Earned, Added Idea, Updated Idea, Product, Challenges Added, Challenges Completed

steps.expected: Activity stream should be filtered to show only wiki-related activities
steps.actual: Activity stream successfully filtered to show only 'authored wiki article' entries. All posts displayed are wiki articles: Test Article with Special Chars, Published Article Test, Group Integration Test Article, Test Article Draft, Test Article for Tagging, Test Article for Search, Test Article for Bookmarks, Test Article for Revision Management, Test Article for Metadata

steps.action: Navigate to another user's profile (Content Editor) and verify subscription options
steps.expected: Follow/Subscribe options should be available on other user's profile
steps.actual: Profile page displayed with 'Friend' and 'Follow' buttons available. Individual posts show 'Subscribe/Unsubscribe' options for post-level subscriptions

steps.action: Click Follow button to subscribe to user's wall
steps.expected: User should be followed and Followers count should increase
steps.actual: After clicking Follow, the button changed to 'Unfollow' and the Followers count increased from 0 to 1, confirming successful subscription

steps.expected: User should be unfollowed and Followers count should decrease
steps.actual: After clicking Unfollow, the button changed back to 'Follow' and the Followers count decreased from 1 to 0, confirming successful unsubscription

observations: The post editor uses a contentEditable div rather than a standard input/textarea element, requiring JavaScript-based text input
The admin persona bar iframe can intercept clicks on profile elements, requiring it to be hidden or working around it
Profile privacy settings offer granular field-level visibility controls (Everyone, Members Only, Admin Only) for each profile field
Wall subscription is implemented through the Follow/Unfollow mechanism on user profiles, with additional post-level Subscribe/Unsubscribe options on individual posts
The activity stream filter supports a comprehensive list of 35+ activity types for granular filtering
Posts on the activity stream include action buttons: Like, Comment, Subscribe/Unsubscribe, Remove, and Pin/Unpin
